name: S.P.R.E.R.O.
overview: In this classic game you play as ' Roderrick Hero ' and must search the cave system for the miners of Mount Leone, who have been trapped deep below after a recent volcanic situation that has occurred. The game features multiple levels, different themed underground areas, dangerous enemies such as spiders, and dynamite to blow up walls to reach the miners trapped below. A C64 game created using only sprites for the Only Sprites Compo
